name: Solar System (itch) (rpg-dev)
description:
For the  Michigan University Course on Coursera: Game Design and Development Course 1.

This is my solar system project. Hope you like it :)

I added the following elements:

  1. The Sun
  2. Mercury
  3. Venus
  4. Earth
  5. Mars
  6. Jupiter
  7. Saturn
  8. Uranus
  9. Neptune
